description: This file defines the interface IAppManager and its nested notification interface in the WPEFramework project. It declares methods for managing applications, including installing, uninstalling, launching, and property management, as well as event notifications for app lifecycle changes.

classes.name: IAppManager
classes.description: Interface for application management, including app lifecycle control and property handling.

nested_classes.name: INotification
nested_classes.description: Notification interface for app lifecycle events such as installation, uninstallation, state changes, and launch requests.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Registers a notification callback.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Unregisters a notification callback.

methods.name: GetLaunchableApps
methods.description: Retrieves a list of launchable applications.

methods.name: GetLoadedApps
methods.description: Retrieves a list of currently loaded applications.

methods.name: LaunchApp
methods.description: Launches an application with a specified intent and arguments.

methods.name: LoadApp
methods.description: Loads an application with a specified intent and arguments.

methods.name: PrepareApp
methods.description: Prepares an application for launch.

methods.name: SendMessage
methods.description: Sends a message to the application.

methods.name: CloseApp
methods.description: Closes an application.

methods.name: TerminateApp
methods.description: Terminates a running application.

methods.name: ClearAppData
methods.description: Clears data for an application.

methods.name: SetAppFocus
methods.description: Sets focus to a specified application.

methods.name: GetAppMetaData
methods.description: Retrieves metadata for an application.

methods.name: GetAppProperty
methods.description: Retrieves a property value for an application.

methods.name: SetAppProperty
methods.description: Sets a property value for an application.

methods.name: SetMaxInactiveApps
methods.description: Sets the maximum number of inactive apps.

methods.name: GetMaxInactiveApps
methods.description: Gets the maximum number of inactive apps.

methods.name: SetMaxHibernatedApps
methods.description: Sets the maximum number of hibernated apps.

methods.name: GetMaxHibernatedApps
methods.description: Gets the maximum number of hibernated apps.

methods.name: SetMaxHibernatedFlashUsage
methods.description: Sets the max flash usage for hibernated apps.

methods.name: GetMaxHibernatedFlashUsage
methods.description: Gets the max flash usage for hibernated apps.

methods.name: SetMaxInactiveRamUsage
methods.description: Sets the maximum inactive RAM usage.

methods.name: GetMaxInactiveRamUsage
methods.description: Gets the maximum inactive RAM usage.

ctags.name: INotification
ctags.pattern: /^  struct EXTERNAL INotification : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
